segments.text: I notice a boy standing precariously on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, and I fear he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, probably to catch the cookies he's sneaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused he is on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks excited, her hand outstretched towards the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mother is just a few feet away, unaware of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, making him the center of this little scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that they're taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, I can't help but find their antics a bit amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or get into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
